query: I want you to create pydantic models for the following API endpoint: "https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui/84815/allrelated.json"
expected_behavior: Successfully loads and activates the pydantic-api-modeling skill
Fetches or analyzes the API endpoint response structure
Generates valid Pydantic models that represent the API response schema
Creates properly typed Python classes with appropriate field types
If running validation scripts, uses the uv run command as instructed
